thread.title: Cruise the Mediterranean with Princess for Over $300 Off!
thread.title_full: Cruise the Mediterranean with Princess for Over $300 Off!

title: Cruise the Mediterranean with Princess for Over $300 Off!
text:
Cruise the Mediterranean with Princess for Over $300 Off! August 21, 2015 
Photo: Thinkstock 
The deal: Take a seven-day Mediterranean cruise with Princess for $999 per person, a discount of $340 on current fares. You also get a cabin category upgrade, gratuities paid in advance, and one specialty dinner. 
When/where you’ll go : There are the available cruises, all on the Royal Princess: Barcelona to Rome, including Marseille and Genoa: May 7 and May 28 Rome to Athens, including Crete, Mykonos and Istanbul: May 14 Athens to Barcelona, including Santorini (pictured) and Naples: May 21 
Why we love it : Not only do you get a big discount off peak-season fares, but you get to go in May, when the weather is cooler and crowds are fewer. 
What you can do on the cruise: When you aren’t seeing some of the world’s most beautiful cities, the Royal Princess has plenty to offer. This includes the first TV studio at sea, where you can attend daily game shows; 16 restaurants and bars; a dance club; a spa and fitness center; a kids club and a teen center; and outdoor movies. 
How long does this deal last? Aug. 24 (subject to availability) 
This deal was provided by Travelzoo Tumblr
